materials_raw_or_page_text:
Each 12-Inch Note journal is a handmade, one-of-a-kind creation, selected at random to bring you a unique, personal touch.
Details
These blank journals are crafted from recycled album covers, re-imagined to give vintage music a new life. The vinyl may be a little warped, and the music may be from another era, but the vibrant album art is as striking as ever—now transformed into a journal as unique and comfortable as our Jean Harem Pants.
Touch the cover, take in the scent! You’re holding decades of music history, ready to keep your to-do’s, shopping lists, love letters, doodles, favorite quotes, and daily thoughts safe and sound.
Options:
Variety 3 Pack

Square 3.5" x 3.5"
Journal 4" x 5"
Notepad 4" x 5"

Mini 2 Pack

Mini 3.5” x 2”

Spiral 2 Pack

3.5” x 2”

Check out how we made them: Watch here on Vimeo!
Handmade by the founders of Buddha Pants. 12inchnotes.com

100% ORGANIC & DYED WITH PLANT-BASED MATERIALS!
Introducing the Buddha Capri—our very first capri pant, handcrafted with care in Thailand and made from the softest organic cotton. Whether you’re traveling, practicing yoga, or just relaxing, these versatile lounge pants are designed to go wherever life takes you. From heels to sandals to barefoot, they’re the perfect companion for any occasion.
Details:
The Buddha Capri is made from super soft organic jersey cotton that moves with you and feels incredible all day long. Available in two timeless, earthy shades—Brick and Black—these capris are as stylish as they are functional. You can wear them up high for a chic, high-waisted look or fold them over for a more relaxed vibe.
The practical design features two inseam pockets for your essentials, and the fabric is a blend of 96.5% organic cotton and 3.5% spandex, making them both eco-friendly and stretchy. With a unisex fit, they’re perfect for yoga, lounging, or casual outings.
Features:


Soft organic jersey cotton—feels as good as it looks

Two inseam pockets—for extra convenience

Available in two colors: Brick & Black

Unisex fit—perfect for all bodies
96.5% organic cotton, 3.5% spandex

Four adult sizes available

Looking for something longer? We’ve got you covered with full-length organic jersey options!
